```pddl
[
  (:action clean
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?target - object ?location - location)
    :precondition (and
      (at ?target ?location)
      (at ?agent ?location)
      (or (dusty ?location) (full ?target) (dirty ?target)))
    :effect (and
      (not (dusty ?location))
      (not (dirty ?target))
      (not (full ?target))
      (dust_free ?location)
      (clean ?target))),

  (:action pickup
    :parameters (?item - object ?container - object ?agent - agent)
    :precondition (and
      (at ?item around_house)
      (at ?agent around_house))
    :effect (and
      (inventory ?agent ?item)
      (not (at ?item around_house))))
]
```
